rabbit.__comment: General RabbitMQ configuration. Define the exchanges and related queues. Note that it possible for more than one change to send messages to a queue through the 'exclusive' setting. The hierarchy in the structure of this file is an effort to make the process easier rather a set of strict rules.

transactionalExchange.__comment: Exchange - All transactional email events from the Drupal application go to this exchange.
transactionalExchange.name: transactionalExchange

transactionalQueue.__comment: Queue - Email events, queue items are used to generate single transaction request to Mandrill.
transactionalQueue.name: transactionalQueue

loggingQueue.__comment: Queue - Mongo based logging of all transactions.
loggingQueue.name: loggingQueue

userRegistrationQueue.__comments: Queue - Submit user registration details to Mailchimp.
userRegistrationQueue.name: userRegistrationQueue

mobileCommonsQueue.__comment: Queue - All transactions with mobile information is submitted to Mobile Commons.
mobileCommonsQueue.name: mobileCommonsQueue

mailchimpCampaignSignupQueue.__comment: Queue - All member campaign activity is added to the user account on Mailchimp.
mailchimpCampaignSignupQueue.name: mailchimpCampaignSignupQueue

userCampaignActivityQueue.__comment: Queue - Adds campaign activity (campaign signup and report backs) to mb-users database.
userCampaignActivityQueue.name: userCampaignActivityQueue

userAPIRegistrationQueue.__comment: Queue - New user registrations information is added to the mb-user database.
userAPIRegistrationQueue.name: userAPIRegistrationQueue

userAPICampaignActivityQueue.__comment: Queue - All user campaign activity (signups and report backs) is added to the mb-user database.
userAPICampaignActivityQueue.name: userAPICampaignActivityQueue

userMailchimpStatusQueue.__comment: Queue - When email accounts are added or updated on Mailchimp a status is returned including any errors or issues that will prevent sending further messages to the email address. This queue logs these issues and updates the mb-user database.
userMailchimpStatusQueue.name: userMailchimpStatusQueue

directMailchimpWebhooks.__comment: Exchange - Entries made by webhook activity sent by Mailchimp. Used to track user unsubscribes via Mailchimp unsubscribe links in Mailchimp generated mass mailouts.
directMailchimpWebhooks.name: directMailchimpWebhooks

mailchimpUnsubscribeQueue.__comment: Queue - Email events, queue items are used to generate single transaction request to Mandrill.
mailchimpUnsubscribeQueue.name: mailchimpUnsubscribeQueue

directUserEvent.__comment: Exchange - User account events by time - birthday, 13th birthday, anniversary, etc.
directUserEvent.name: directUserEvent

userEventBirthdayQueue.__comment: Queue - Users who have a birthday today.
userEventBirthdayQueue.name: userEventBirthdayQueue

userEvent13BirthdayQueue.__comment: Queue - Users who turn 13 years of age and thus start to get general DoSomething.org broadcasts..
userEvent13BirthdayQueue.name: userEvent13BirthdayQueue

userEventAnniversaryQueue.__comment: Queue - User who have signed up to DoSomehting.org one year ago.
userEventAnniversaryQueue.name: userEventAnniversaryQueue

directUserDigestExchange.__comment: Exchange - Summary email messages for allof a users campaign activity.
directUserDigestExchange.name: directUserDigestExchange

userDigestQueue.__comment: Queue - Users that have campaign activity that could get sent a digest message.
userDigestQueue.name: userDigestQueue

directUserImport.__comment: Exchange - Summary email messages for allof a users campaign activity.
directUserImport.name: directUserImport

userImportQueue.__comment: Queue - User information imported from sources outside of DoSomething.org.
userImportQueue.name: userImportQueue

directUserImportExistingLogging.__comment: Exchange - Log all user import results checkoing with each service (Mailchimp, Mobile Commons and Drupal) for existing sites.
directUserImportExistingLogging.name: directUserImportExistingLogging

userImportQueue.__comment: Queue - User information imported from sources outside of DoSomething.org.
userImportQueue.name: userImportQueue

directHeartbeatExchange.__comment: Exchange - Summary email messages for allof a users campaign activity.
directHeartbeatExchange.name: directHeartbeatExchange

heartbeatQueue.__comment: Queue - Heartbeat activities to monitor as it flows through the system.
heartbeatQueue.name: heartbeatQueue
